desc.name: 自焚烈焰
desc.desc: 菲利普混乱抗性提升50%，过热只会使混乱抗性降至{0}，过热时造成的伤害+{1}

desc.name: Immolation
desc.desc:
Increase Philip's max Stagger Resist by 50%;
OverHeat will change Stagger Resisteance to {0}; Increase Damage dealt by {1} when Overheated

desc.name: 静默无言
desc.desc: 哭泣之子速度骰+1，攻击{0}激进并且最大血量和混乱抗性提高{1}%

desc.name: Them Not Speak
desc.desc:
Increase Unspeaking Childs gain +1 speed die and their attack pattern becomes {0} aggressive; 
Increase Max HP and Max Stagger Resist by {1}%

desc.name: 大提琴的悲哀
desc.desc: 使菲利普的攻击方式更加激进

desc.name: Weighty Cello
desc.desc: Philip's attack pattern becomes more aggressive.

desc.name: 宗教狂潮
desc.desc: 艾琳血量提升{0}%，齿轮信徒{1}。

desc.name: Frantic Faith
desc.desc:
Increase Eileen's max Hp by {0}%;
The Gear Worshippers {1}.

desc.name: 齿轮护卫
desc.desc:
齿轮信徒血量和混乱抗性提升{0}, “思想齿轮: 洗脑”时第二骰最大值提高{1}
若有齿轮信徒存活则艾琳所受到的伤害将会转移到存活的齿轮信徒身上。

desc.name: Body Guard
竖琴的锋锐
desc.desc: 齿轮信徒获得全新牌库

desc.name: Sharp Harp
desc.desc: The Gear Worshippers gain an unique deck of combat pages.

desc.name: 八香五料
desc.desc:
拼点胜利时对目标随机施加1层麻痹/易损/束缚;施加流血层数+{0};
陷入混乱或者被生擒的司书会被永久施加{1}层虚弱,破绽(可叠加);优先攻击没有负面状态的司书并会立刻对大肉使用开饭.

desc.name: Season and Spice
除腥去脏
desc.desc:
第一阶段体力改为无法低于50%并且若体力低于60%就进入下一阶段.
使用生擒时会额外对{0}个司书使用生擒;从大肉获得的治疗提高{1}%.

desc.name: Mince and Mash
desc.desc:
In the first phase, HP does not fall below 50% and if it's at or below 60%, proceed to the next phase;
When using “Into the Sack you go!”, use it to {0} more librarins; Increase Hp recovered from Fresh Meat by {1}%.

desc.name: 鼓的震慑
desc.desc: 舞台开启时改为获得100层抵御,改为每三幕开始时若该角色抵御层数为0则清空所有负面状态并获得50层抵御

desc.name: Menacing Percussion
沉浸演出
desc.desc:
速度骰+{0}并且攻击方式更加激进.
顶点大合奏的书页效果扩展到所有目标并且下一幕额外施加2层{1}.

desc.name: Immersive Performance
desc.desc:
Speed Dice +{0} and attack pattern becom more aggressive.
Chorus at the Climax's effect will be applied to all targets and inflict extra 2 {1} next Scene.

desc.name: 激情感染
desc.desc:
不来梅存活时,除不来梅外友方单位死亡后第2幕会复活,
复活单位的情感等级提升至不来梅情感等级.
除不来梅其他友方单位获得{0}并且使用书页
获得“强壮”,“忍耐”,“敏捷”,“守护”时使随机友方单位获得相同效果(每一幕至多触发{1}次)

desc.name: Influence with Passion
desc.desc:
Allies except Bremen will be revived with Bremen's Emotion Level
 2 Scene after their death as long as Bremen is alive.
Bremen's allies gain {0};
When gaining Strength, Endurance, Haste, or Protection through Combat Pages,
give the same status effect to a random other ally
(At most {1} times per Scene).

desc.name: 圆号,大号与长号
desc.desc: 提升混乱抗性至200,使用近战书页时可以无视”不可指定为目标“的效果。一幕内最多承受15%最大血量的伤害

desc.name: Horn, Tuba and Trombone
desc.desc:
Increase Max Stagger Resist to 200, Ignore 'Untargetable' effect while using Melee Page.
Take at most 15% of Max HP in one Scene.

desc.name: We do a little Trolling
desc.desc:
奥斯瓦尔德改为幕开始时使造成伤害最多的司书陷入迷惑;若场上无非迷惑的司书存活则接待失败.
陷入迷惑的司书{0}.

desc.name: We do a little Trolling
单簧管的嘶哑
desc.desc: 额外出现“艾玛与诺亚”且其战斗书页数值大幅提升.

desc.name: Throaty Clarinet
desc.desc: Emma & Noah will appear and their combat pages are enhanced

desc.name: 巅峰之力
desc.desc:
移除所有书页的反击骰子，被单方面攻击时以“拳打”，“脚踢”，“狼之猛袭”，“恐吓”其中一个回击;
拼点时{0}.

desc.name: Pinnical Strength
一人成军
desc.desc:
速度骰+2,攻击方式变得{0}激进，减少{1}%承受的伤害和混乱伤害.
一幕内使用书页攻击同一司书4次会让塔尼娅“看破”该司书的攻击;下一幕与其拼点时该司书书页的所有骰子都会被无效化.

desc.name: One Man Army
中提琴的浓暗
desc.desc: 热身完毕会再次触发一次，此次触发之后每一幕结束时塔尼亚恢复10%最大生命值且无法陷入混乱

desc.name: Dark Viola
desc.desc:
'Time for Round Two' can be triggered again;
Tanya will recover 10% of max HP every Scene and become unstaggerable afterwards

desc.name: 傀儡之舞
desc.desc: 在宪反击骰威力+{0}，有其他友方单位存活时免疫任何伤害和混乱伤害,提高首次施加操纵层数+{1}

desc.name: Puppet Performance
自由操纵
desc.desc: 在宪会在傀儡失去操纵后的第{0}幕重新获得其控制,操纵速度骰+1,在宪混乱抗性提升{1}%

desc.name: Strings Dexterity
desc.desc:
{0} Scene after Puppets lose Puppet Strings, Jae-heon will apply new Puppet Strings to them;
Puppets with Puppet Strings gain + 1 speed dice; Increase Jae-heon's Max Stagger Resist by {1}%.

desc.name: 第二小提琴的愤慨
desc.desc: 使在宪的攻击方式更加激进

desc.name: Shrill Second Violin
desc.desc: Jae-heon's Attack Pattern becomes more aggressive.

desc.name: 烧灼十字
desc.desc: 被朱红十字攻击3次会下一幕内获得{0}层烧印(被朱红十字攻击会消耗一层并使其对其他司书额外攻击,此次伤害提升{1}%)

desc.name: Scorching Cross
desc.desc:
Upon being hit by The Vermilion Cross 3 times will gain {0} Scorched the next Scene
(Upon Hit by The Vermilion Cross reduce the stack by 1
 and make him attack a random other Librarian with Damage boosted by {1}%).

desc.name: 血管盛宴
desc.desc: 伊莲娜会将血量低于{0}%的司书转化为攻击其他友方单位的无名躯壳，伊莲娜最大血量提升{1}%

desc.name: Feast
一号小提琴的典雅
desc.desc: 使伊莲娜和朱红十字的攻击方式更加激进

desc.name: Introspective First Violin
desc.desc: The Vermilion Cross and Elena's Attack Pattern becomes more aggressive.

desc.name: 真假难分
desc.desc: 提高阴影{0}%血量和混乱抗性,阴影攻击其复制司书骰子威力提升{1}点

desc.name: Indifference
desc.desc:
Increase Shades' max HP and Stagger Resist by {0}%;
Boost dice Power against the Libarian copied from by {1}.

desc.name: 碾压结界
desc.desc: 被锁入封印结界的司书每1幕会承受{0}%最大血量的伤害，提高100%普鲁托的血量和陷入封印结界司书{1}%混乱抗性

desc.name: Crashing Barrier
desc.desc:
Librarians in the Sealing Barrier take Damage equal to {0}% of their max HP;
Increase Pluto's max HP by 100%; Increase max Stagger Resist Librarian sent to Sealing Barrier by {1}%.

desc.name: 管风琴的洪大
desc.desc: 每3幕普鲁托会发布一个新的随机合同

desc.name: Austere Pipe Organ
desc.desc: Release a new Random Contract per 3 Scene.
